Title: Farm Animals/Fishing Time
Plot:
This episode of Network Wiggles is mainly about Musical Instruments.  The opening song is "Rock-a-bye your bear".  In Network Wiggles News, Dorothy visits an animal farm.  Captain predicts a flurry of feathers.  The mascots do some cycling.

Anthony builds a fishing setup, Murray introduces a bunch of instruments to the kids, and Jeff falls asleep in the Sydney Orchestra..

Song List:
"Rock a bye your bear"
"Caveland"
"Wiggle Bay"
"Vegetable Soup"
"Swim like a Fish"
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
